children.subject: I think it really depends on how likely you feel like you'll be able to declare or not. What's your situation in terms of what grade you need in this last one? Also, would you appeal if you missed it by a little and have a pretty strong argument in why you should be able to declare if you did? If you feel like it'd be quite hard to declare (like your midterm 1 missed it by a lot), maybe consider signing up for courses for a different major? But you still have midterm 2 and the final which are 65% so really lot of hope there!

history.content: Are there and tips on deciding what classes I should take if I'm not sure if I will be able to declare cs or not next semester (I am taking the last of the 3 gpa cs lower divs now). For example, should I take EE16B and 61C? Thanks
history.subject: Not sure if I will declare, how do i decide on classes
